name: rude
content:
rude adjective
(NOT POLITE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 not polite; offensive or embarrassing: He's a very rude man. It's rude not to say "Thank you" when you are given something. He's got no manners - he's rude to everyone. He shouted a collection of rude words at me and stormed off.
